# [Safe Door Scavenge](https://forums.alliedmods.net/showpost.php?p=2811086&postcount=3)

## About
Fork by **sorallll**'s [[L4D2]Safe Door Scavenge](https://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?t=335661)

// Default: "0.25"

// How long is the panic event interval after the scavenge starts?(0.0=off)

// Minimum: "0.000000"

// How many barrels of oil does each player need to unlock the safe room door (the value greater than 0 will override the value of safedoor_scavenge_needed. 0=use the default setting)

## Changes Log
~~~
(1.0.5fork)

2023-10-?
- Fixed: Sometimes survivor bots will disappear after a chapter transition.

2023-10-05
- Added some sound effects and music.
- After the initial generation, delayed the re-generation of gas cans.
  Allows for setting different spawn distances.
  Allows for configuring spawn interval times.
  Configurable for generating a fixed quantity each time
    or based on the number of players.
- Prevented Standard Gascan.
- Eliminated all Scavenge/Green/Green Scavenge Gascan refills after unlocking the safe room.
- No longer generate gas cans within the same game frame.
  Configurable random generation time range.
- Added some hints.
  Including translations in both English and Sim
~~~
